text: To generate music, provide lyrics and select an emotion. The system will create a song matching the mood.
Available emotions for lyrics generation: happy, sad, emotional, energetic, romantic, relaxed.
Check music generation status using the job ID returned when you started the process.
Music theory is the study of the practices and possibilities of music. It generally derives from observation of how musicians and composers make music.
A chord is a group of notes played together. The most common chords are triads, consisting of three notes: the root, third, and fifth.
Song structure typically includes sections like intro, verse, chorus, bridge, and outro. Pop songs often follow a verse-chorus-verse-chorus-bridge-chorus structure.
A digital audio workstation (DAW) is an electronic device or application software used for recording, editing and producing audio files.
